name: @next-book/boilerplate
description: Quick start for publishing web books with next-book.

scripts.build: npm run build:js && hugo --config config.toml && node filters.js && publish-nb --src _temp --out _book && npm run cleanup
scripts.server: npm run build:js && hugo --config config.toml && node filters.js && publish-nb -w --src _temp --out _book

author: Jan Martinek
